alert.note: Alert for Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 1:33AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Blaine County through 215 AM MDT... At 132 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Turner, or 35 miles northeast of Chinook, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Turner and Hogeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
